title.rendered: Weaving Together Harmonic Melodies with Hard-Hitting, Vivid Storytelling– Malik Weighz Unveils “King Cobra Mentality”

content.rendered:
Malik Weighz

A 13-track record, Malik Weighz’ newest record is a bold, unyielding, and inimitable album which embodies the fierce genius of a Trap Soul prodigy

DALLAS, TEXAS, UNITED STATES, November 22, 2023 /EINPresswire.com/ — On October 23, 2023, Malik Weighz unleashed his much-anticipated mixtape, “King Cobra Mentality,” inviting listeners into the immersive world of Trap Soul. This project is more than a collection of tracks; it marks a glimpse into Malik Weighz’s life, a canvas painted with his journey, struggles, and triumphs.

As the beats unfold, the audience is transported into the Oakcliff streets, feeling the pulse of the neighborhood that shaped Malik Weighz’s artistry. With tracks like “Street Passion,” “Sunshine,” and “Dream Chaser,” Malik presents a record that reflects ambition, resilience, and masterful craftsmanship.

Malik’s new mixtape teases with the boundaries of what is music itself- “King Cobra Mentality”- true to its title – reflects resilience, ambition, and the burning desire for a better life. Through immersive storytelling and intricate wordplay, Malik Weighz invites his listeners to witness his experiences, struggles, and triumphs.

What sets Malik Weighz apart is not just his ability to create catchy melodies or his skillful rap delivery. Rather, it is the unique style which the artist has carved for himself. In the realm of Trap Soul, Malik Weighz is a pioneer, blending genres seamlessly to create a signature sound that resonates with authenticity.

Malik Weighz is more than an artist; he’s a motivator. Through his music and his journey, he encourages readers to follow their dreams, to cultivate that burning desire for a better life. His motivation is deeply rooted in family, aspiring to create a legacy that provides a better future for those he holds dear.

Malik Weighz isn’t just an artist; he’s a movement, an embodiment of dreams set to melodies, and he invites the world to be a part of it. The path ahead is one of growth, exploration, and pushing the boundaries of Trap Soul.

Join Malik Weighz on his stunning musical voyage as he invites readers to check out his music, follow him on social media, and reach out for interviews, reviews, and/or collaborations!

###

ABOUT

Malik Weighz, who was born Dameyune Lynn Nelms in 1996, emerges as a rising force in the world of Hip Hop and Rap. Hailing from the vibrant Oakcliff area of Dallas, Texas, Malik Weighz’s musical journey started at an early age under the influence of his older cousin, Johnathan, who ignited the spark of rap within him.

An artist and storyteller, Malik Weighz creates aggressive and harmonious melodies with vivid narrative lyrics. His unique style, known as Trap Soul, seamlessly weaves trap and R&B elements, creating a sonic landscape that reflects his life experiences and storytelling prowess. Malik envisions himself as one of the biggest artists of his time, with aspirations that extend beyond musical success.

LINKS

Instagram: https://instagram.com/malikweighz?igshid=MzMyNGUyNmU2YQ%3D%3D&utm_source=qr

YouTube: https://youtube.com/channel/UCuDnr7VUHg2BI8YMdXBz4_A?si=9xXaBC2cwBKs-19d

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/6zurnXPzQzW6Ga18ztR2mz?si=wXDNcO9bR-aZ_l5bx7L8iQ

SoundCloud: https://on.soundcloud.com/pEzE1AUxvGNB6rQL7

Malik Weighz
Malik Weighz
+1 800-983-1362
nelmsdameyune@gmail.com

News Provided By

November 22, 2023, 15:51 GMT
